name: Vidiot Game
description:
WARNING: VIDIOT GAME MAY CAUSE BRAIN DAMAGE. PLAY AT YOUR OWN DEMISE.

The never-ending Xbox Indie "classic" is now free on PC. Can you figure out what the hell is going on? Probably not, but have fun trying!

Features
+ Play as Ungus Fungus, Doug Beach, and Hiratio.
+ Several plots and schemes.
+ Many minigames, from robbing a bank to flying through cyberspace.
+ WaCkY EfFeCtS.
+ Gamepad support.
